message: I propose a fair split, taking 90% and leaving 10% for you. It's a good deal for both of us!
Alice, your offer was quite cheeky! Let's be reasonable. I propose a 70/30 split in my favor.  Consider that the value decreases for you with each round.
I'll counter your offer with a 40/60 split. It's still in your favor, but a bit closer to what I believe is a fair compromise. Let's find a middle ground before the value continues to drop for me.
